title: 著蜘蛛俠full suit 去Disney 會唔會比人趕？

replies.msg:
佢話唔比人著Disney Character
蜘蛛仔已經壽終正寢，應該可以著？

Attire that is not appropriate for the parks—and which may result in refusal of admittance—includes but is not limited to:

Adult costumes or clothing that can be viewed as representative of an actual Disney character. Please note that costumes may not be worn by Guests aged 16 or older
